title: Sono Koi Wa Kare Wo Mushibamu
alternative_title: その恋は彼を蝕む ; This Love Is Consuming Me
status: その恋は彼を蝕む ; This Love Is Consuming Me
description:
Description :
        On his was back home, Mine Ryouta is accidentally got himself attacked at a park, a hotspot for gays, but is rescued by Souma, a guy from “the other side”.Ryouta is warned not to pass over to “the other side”, but he cannot forget the charming eyes of that junior. The closer he gets, the more barriers start to burn down. An unstoppable first love!A dangerously charming seme and an in love matters inexperienced man get sexually involved.This is the premise for the characters created for this new doujin series!
